attributes.action: ENSURE THAT ALL MINISTERS ABUSING EXSPENSES ARE INVESTIGATED BY THE POLICE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr brown should ensure that all politicians claiming huge amounts of public money and abusing the system should be investigated by the police, ministers are not above the law, any othe person claiming state benifit by wrongfull means would have to explain why the the police and the courts, SO WHY NOT THE PEOPLE WHO ARE TRUSTED TO RUN OUR COUNTRY

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
